abstract: Labor Department reports that unemployment rates fell in 42 states in December, latest evidence of nationwide resurgence in hiring.
lead_paragraph: The Labor Department said on Tuesday that rates rose in just four states and were unchanged in four others.
snippet: The Labor Department said on Tuesday that rates rose in just four states and were unchanged in four others.

headline.main: 42 States Show Drop in Unemployment Rates
headline.print_headline: 42 States Show Drop in Unemployment Rates
